info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 6:55PM MDT until June 06 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 654 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tecolote, or 11 miles south of Las Vegas, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Las Vegas, Romeroville, Los Montoyas and San Agustin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 340 and 345. State Road 283 near Mile Marker 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
